puzzle.help: 1. Now try to pour the water in different colors and sort the water in the same color into the same bottles. 2. Tap a bottle first, then tap another bottle, and pour water from the first bottle to the second one. 3. You can pour when two bottles have the same water color on the top, and there's enough space for the second bottle to be poured. 4. Each bottle could only hold a certain amount of water. If it's full, no more could be poured.
